00024 
00025 void calcgradHamiltonianmpi(const Interaction *P,
00026                             const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00027                             const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00028                             gradSlaterDet* dh)
00029 {
00030   dh->val = 0.0;
00031   zerogradSlaterDet(dh);
00032 
00033   calcgradT(Q, X, dX, dh);
00034   if (P->cm)
00035     calcgradTCM(Q, X, dX, dh);
00036   calcgradPotentialmpi(P, Q, X, dX, dh);
00037 }

00039 
00040 void calcgradHamiltonianodmpi(const Interaction *P,
00041                               const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00042                               const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00043                               const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00044                               gradSlaterDet* dh)
00045 {
00046   dh->val = 0.0;
00047   zerogradSlaterDet(dh);
00048 
00049   calcgradTod(Q, Qp, X, dX, dh);
00050   if (P->cm)
00051     calcgradTCMod(Q, Qp, X, dX, dh);
00052   calcgradPotentialodmpi(P, Q, Qp, X, dX, dh);
00053 }

00056 #define SQR(x) ((x)*(x))
00057 
00058 void calcgradPotentialmpi(const Interaction *P,
00059                           const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00060                           const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00061                           gradSlaterDet* dv)
00062 {
00063   int task = TASKGRADPOTENTIAL;
00064   int i;
00065   int A=Q->A;
00066   int todo=A*A;
00067   int ngauss=Q->ngauss;
00068   int k[2]={0,0}; 
00069   int done=0; int rank;
00070   gradSlaterDet dvrowcol;
00071   MPI_Status status;
00072   
00073   allocategradSlaterDet(&dvrowcol, A);
00074 
00075   BroadcastTask(&task);
00076   BroadcastSlaterDet(Q);
00077   // BroadcastSlaterDetAux(Q, X);
00078   // BroadcastgradSlaterDetAux(Q, dX);
00079 
00080   // supply slaves with work
00081   for (rank=1; rank<mpisize; rank++) {
00082 
00083     MPI_Send(k, 2, MPI_INT, rank, TAGROWCOL, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00084     k[1]++;
00085     if (k[1] == A) {
00086       k[0]++; k[1]=0;
00087     }
00088   }
00089 
00090   while (1) {
00091     MPI_Recv(&dvrowcol.val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, MPI_ANY_SOURCE, 
00092              TAGGRADPOTENTIALVAL,
00093              MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00094     MPI_Recv(dvrowcol.gradval, ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian), 
00095              MPI_BYTE, MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGGRADPOTENTIALGRAD, 
00096              MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status); 
00097     rank = status.MPI_SOURCE;
00098 
00099     dv->val += dvrowcol.val;
00100     for (i=0; i<ngauss; i++)
00101       addmulttogradGaussian(&dv->gradval[i], &dvrowcol.gradval[i], 1.0);
00102 
00103     done++;
00104 
00105     // all work distributed ?
00106     if (k[0] == A)
00107       break;
00108 
00109     MPI_Send(k, 2, MPI_INT, rank, TAGROWCOL, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00110 
00111     k[1]++;
00112     if (k[1] == A) {
00113       k[0]++; k[1]=0;
00114     }
00115   }
00116 
00117   // collect remaining results
00118   while (done<todo) {
00119     MPI_Recv(&dvrowcol.val, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_COMPLEX, MPI_ANY_SOURCE, 
00120              TAGGRADPOTENTIALVAL,
00121              MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00122     MPI_Recv(dvrowcol.gradval, ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian), 
00123              MPI_BYTE, MPI_ANY_SOURCE, TAGGRADPOTENTIALGRAD, 
00124              MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status); 
00125 
00126     dv->val += dvrowcol.val;
00127     for (i=0; i<ngauss; i++)
00128       addmulttogradGaussian(&dv->gradval[i], &dvrowcol.gradval[i], 1.0);
00129     done++;
00130   }
00131 
00132   // tell slaves we have finished
00133   k[0] = -1;
00134   for (rank=1; rank<mpisize; rank++) {
00135     MPI_Send(k, 2, MPI_INT, rank, TAGROWCOL, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00136   }
00137 
00138   freegradSlaterDet(&dvrowcol);
00139 }
